subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said that soreness in his left elbow would keep him out of the AT&T National at Congressional next week, and that he would not compete until the British Open next month.
snippet: Tiger Woods said that soreness in his left elbow would keep him out of the AT&T National at Congressional next week, and that he would not compete until the British Open next month.
